title: Cardano and Christianity for Africa
description: さらなる経済的アイデンティティとエンパワーメント、キリスト教と調和したアフリカ大陸での金融包摂のために。

f6_assessments.q0: Draft proposal. There is no problem in the problem statement. The idea described is not clear and understandable. There is not enough information for impact assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q1: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for feasibility  assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q2: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for auditability  assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.

f6_assessments.q0: The solution proposed through this proposal is realistic, and consists in making Christian parishes in Africa become stake pools. This idea may scalable and expand to various cities, countries. However it should be well presented, and with clear collaboration with religious institutions (parishes) that need a buy-in fir the idea for it to be successful.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposals is incomplete. It doesn't respond to the question HOW in order to allow assessors to be able to measure the feasibility. Spend $250000 on a proposal is a lot of money that need to be proven and supported with a plan that has to be detailed and clear to understand.
The way the proposal is presented doesn't allow me to assess it. Hopefully the idea would be considered for next funding rounds.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer team didn't complete adding necessary information that would have allowed to rate this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Religion has no place in Project catalyst and nothing to do with the mission of Cardano. Please keep it secular. Not sure how more stakepools at auch high costs will further NOTE: I notices tge proposer has asked to withdraw the proposal themselves which has not been done yet. Due to the sheer amount of proposals in this funding round and the possibility that this might be overseen completely because they just wrote it in the comment, i have still left an assessment so this proposal does not accidentaly go to funding stage even though the proposers don't want this themselves cardanos mission. solution: 私たちは、それぞれのキリスト教の教区が、Atala PRISM dAppを備えたCardanoのステークプールになることで、アフリカでのCardanoの普及を加速させることを構想しています。
experience: 私たちは、FAITH Stake Pool Startupです。私たちはBig Tech出身で、Cardanoとそれがどのように私たちの世界を変えるかについて情熱を持っています。
